original: tadihānyathākhyātipakṣe viparyayasya saṃśayasya ca vyavacchedārtham “yathāvasthitavyavahārānuguṇaṃ jñānam” iti pramāṇalakṣaṇe yathāvasthitādiviśeṣaṇam

original: dvitīye tu pakṣe sāmānyato dharmisphuraṇe sati apratipannatadvirodhaviruddhaviśeṣādhyavasāya iti //

original: tatra ekaviśeṣasphuraṇaṃ yathā--- pītaḥ śaṅkha ityādi /

original: viṣaya iti na kenāpi pramāṇena nirviśeṣavastusiddhiḥ” ityanyeṣāmanādaraḥ kṛtaḥ /

original: yattu “mattaḥ smṛtijñārnamapohanaṃ ca” ityatra bhāṣyam--- “jñānamindriyaliṅgāgamayogajo vastuniścayaḥ” iti,

original: uktaṃ ca śrīviṣṇucittaiḥ prameyasaṃgrahe--- “pramāṇasaṃkhyāvivāde 'pītyatra tripramāṇatvaṃ bhāṣyoktam” iti /

original: sarvajñaṃ satyasaṃkalpaṃ paraṃ brahmābhyupagacchatāṃ kiṃ na setsyati kiṃ nopapadyate---”

original: uktaṃ ca tattvaratnākare --- “pratyakṣādimūlānāṃ smṛtīnāṃ svasvamūle 'ntarbhāvavivakṣayā pramāṇatritvāvirodhaḥ /

original: sa cācamanuvādaḥ pūrvopāttaḥ--- “smṛtiḥ pratyakṣamaitihyamanumānaṃ catuṣṭayam” iti pratyakṣādyaviśeṣeṇa vedānuvādācca---iti /

original: prajñāparitrāṇe tu smṛtiprāmāṇyānabhyupagame 'pi jñānasya tāvat karaṇabhedāccāturvidhyamevoktam--- “tatrendriyārthasaṃbandho liṅgaśabdagrahau  #
analyzed: prajñā paritrāṇe tu smṛti prāmāṇya an abhyupagame jñānasya tāvat karaṇa bhedāt cāturvidhyam eva uktam tatra indriya artha saṃbandhaḥ liṅga śabda grahau
tathā
saṃskāra unmeṣaḥ iti ete saṃvidām janma hetavaḥ
iti
yat tu tatra eva svayam siddhiḥ tathā divyam pratyakṣam anum āgamaḥ
pañca santi pramāṇāni jaimini vyāsayoḥ hṛdi
ityādinā svayaṃsiddhi divyayoḥ pṛthak nirūpaṇam kṛtam
tat pratyakṣa avāntara vairūpya bodhana abhiprāyam

pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam
tatra sākṣātkāri pramā pratyakṣam

original: sākṣāttvaṃ ca jātirūpa upādhirūpo vā kaścit jñānasvabhāvaviśeṣaḥ svātmasākṣikaḥ //
analyzed: sākṣāt tvam ca jāti rūpaḥ upādhi rūpaḥ vā kaścid jñāna svabhāva viśeṣaḥ sva ātma sākṣikaḥ
jñāta kāraṇa ja jñāna smṛti tva rahitā matiḥ
aparokṣā iti niṣkarṣe na avyāpi ādi prasañjanam
prameyasaṃgrahe tu evam uktam sākṣāt anubhavaḥ pratyakṣam
sākṣāt tvam jātiḥ ityādi
tattvaratnākare pi evam uktam aparokṣa pramā adhyakṣam āparokṣyam ca saṃvidaḥ
iti
pārokṣyam ca evam uktam pārokṣyam vyavahārya an antargata vastu vedanā apekṣā
tad anantargata liṅga ādi apekṣā pārokṣyam anumā ādau iti
varada viṣṇu miśraiḥ mānaya arthātmya nirṇaye tu evam uktam aparokṣa pramā pratyakṣam
pramāyāḥ āparokṣyam nāma viśada avabhāsa tvam iti brūmaḥ
kim idam vaiśadyam nāma
sākṣāt tvam dvidhā anityam ca anityam
asmat ādi jñāna niṣṭham tu anityam
asmat ādi pratyakṣam dvidhā yogi pratyakṣam ayogi pratyakṣam ca iti
tatra yogi pratyakṣam prakṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa viśeṣa jam
viyukta avasthāyām tu bāhya indriya janyam api
tat ca bubhutsā ādi pratiniyatam āgama eka siddham ca
bhāvanā bala ja mātram jagat kartari pratyakṣam pratikṣiptam śāstrayoni adhikaraṇe
anyatra bhāṣyakāraiḥ eva sākṣāt yogi pratyakṣasya kaṇṭhokteḥ
tasya saṃbhavataḥ pi āgamika īśvara jñāna mūlasya āgama anuvāda tva āpādana aśaktyā tatra audāsīnyāt
dharma ādayaḥ kasyacid indriya grāhyāḥ
prameya tvāt
ghaṭa vat
mīmāṃsakānām apratyakṣa tvāt vā
asmad sukha ādi vat ityādi anumānānām vipakṣe bādhaka viraha ādibhiḥ ābhāsa tvāt
āgama bādha prasaṅgasya eva puraskāre tu āgamena eva caritārtha tvāt

original: anyathā dharmādayaḥ kasyaciccakṣurgrāhyā iti vadato bauddhasya kiṃ prativakṣyasi /
analyzed: anyathā dharma ādayaḥ kasyacid cakṣuḥ grāhyāḥ iti vadataḥ bauddhasya kim prativakṣyasi
yaḥ ca anuvyavasāye sa viṣaya vyavasāya pratyakṣa tām icchati
tasya asmat ādiṣu api dharma ādi vyavasāya anuvyavasāye dharma ādi pratyakṣa tva siddhau katham tad atirikta yogi pratyakṣa anumā siddhiḥ
tad vyavacchedena prayoge
api saugata ukta cākṣuṣa tva ādi sādhana prasaṅga syāt iti
sa ca adṛṣṭa viśeṣaḥ yoga abhyāsa tapaḥ ca ārya ādibhiḥ jāyate
tasmāt ārṣa abhimatam api prakṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa ja tva aviśeṣāt tatra eva antarbhūtam
yathā uktam prajñāparitrāṇe atra indriya anapekṣam yat jñānam artha avabhāsakam
divyam pramāṇam iti etat pramāṇa jñāḥ pracakṣate
parameśvara vijñānam muktānām ca dhiyaḥ tathā
saṃjaya arjuna vālmīki prabhṛti ārṣa dhiyaḥ pi tat
iti
indriya anapekṣam iti arthaḥ

original: ata eva hi gīyate--- “divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ---” ityādi /
analyzed: atas eva hi gīyate divyam dadāmi te cakṣuḥ ityādi
yat vā aparameśvara ādi vijñāna sahapāṭha ādibhiḥ tathā eva mantavyam
anantaram ca evam uktam svābhāvikasya jñānasya svatas sarva avabhāsinaḥ
avidyā pratibandhasya
avidyā hānitaḥ mukta puruṣāṇām hi saṃvidām
svābhāvika svarūpeṇa nikhila artha avabhāsi tā
pratibandhaka bhāvasya pratyuttambhaka bhāvinā
pareṇa anugṛhītā dhīḥ ṛṣīṇām sarva bhāsikā
iti
mānasa pratyakṣam api asmat ādīnām na asti eva iti vṛddha saṃpradāyaḥ
ātma svarūpasya tad dharma bhūta jñānasya ca svayam prakāśa tvāt
sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa prayatnānām tad tad hetutayā abhimata jñāna viśeṣa anatirekasya vedārthasaṃgrahe samarthita tvāt
nitya tva ādi viśiṣṭa asmat ādi anubhavasya śāstra ādi prasiddha tvāt
pūrva anubhava ādi jñānasya smṛti rūpa tvāt
ātma sukha ādi vyatirikta bahis viṣayeṣu tasya bāhya indriya anapekṣa pravṛtti anupapatteḥ iti śāstrayoni adhikaraṇa bhāṣyasya anvāroheṇa api upapatteḥ iti
tatas ca adivya bāhya indriya prasūtam jñānam ayogi pratyakṣam
tat sāmānya adṛṣṭa āloka viśeṣa ādi sahakṛta indriya janyam dṛṣṭa sāmagrī viśeṣāt pratiniyata aviṣayam
tat śrotra ādi indriya asādhāraṇa kāraṇa bhedāt pañcadhā
viṣaya indriya saṃbandhaḥ ca dravyeṣu saṃyogaḥ
dravya āśriteṣu rūpa ādiṣu tu saṃyukta āśrayaṇam

original: yathoktaṃ tattvaratnākare--- “atra vṛddhā vidāmāsuḥ saṃyogaḥ saṃnikarṣaṇam /
analyzed: yathā uktam tattvaratnākare atra vṛddhāḥ vidāmāsuḥ saṃyogaḥ saṃnikarṣaṇam
saṃyukta āśrayaṇam ca iti yathāsaṃbhavam ūhyatām
iti
punar pratyakṣam dvidhā savikalpakam nirvikalpakam ca iti
sa pratyavamarśam pratayakṣam sa vikalpakam
tad rahitam pratyakṣam nirvikalpakam
nyā pa pra
ubhayavidham api etat viśiṣṭa viṣayam eva
a viśiṣṭa vastu grāhiṇaḥ jñānasya anupalambhāt anupapatteḥ ca
bāla mūka tiryak ādi vijñānam api hi saṃjñā vikalpa rahitam api viśiṣṭa vastu viṣayam eva
anyathā teṣām heya upādeya vibhāga pūrvaka pravṛtti śeṣa anupapatteḥ
vipratipannam viśiṣṭa jñānam viśeṣaṇa jñāna pūrvakam
viśiṣṭa jñāna tvāt
surabhi candanam ityādi viśiṣṭa jñāna vat iti ced na
eka sāmagrī vedya viśeṣaṇeṣu tad nirapekṣa tvāt
sva rūpa saṃbandha pakṣe sva rūpa graheṇa eva saṃbandhasya api grahaṇāt
tāvatā eva viśiṣṭa grahaṇa siddheḥ
samavāya vāde pi tasya eva gṛhyamāṇasya viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva rūpa tvāt
samavāya viśiṣṭa pratyaye tathā eva abhyupagamāt
tad vaiśiṣṭya grahe ca guṇa vaiśiṣṭya grahasya avarjanīya tvāt
na ca samavāyasya sa vikalpaka eka viṣaya tā iti vācyam
nirvikalpake dharma vat dharmi vat ca tad saṃbandhasya api aindriyika tva aviśeṣeṇa grahaṇa saṃbhavāt
yogyasya saṃnikṛṣṭa gṛhyamāṇa saṃbandhinaḥ saṃbandhasya agrahaṇa anupapatteḥ
anyathā nityam tad agraha āpātāt
prathama akṣa saṃnipāta jā buddhiḥ viśiṣṭa viṣayā
buddhi tvāt
saṃpratipanna vat
ityādi api cintyam
nyā pa pra

original: na ca savikalpakaṃ na pratyakṣamiti vācyam,
analyzed: na ca sa vikalpakam na pratyakṣam iti vācyam
sākṣātkāra ābādha ādi aviśeṣāt
sahakāri viśeṣeṇa na vaijātyam prasajyate
tad jātīye tu yat kiñcid vaiṣamyam saṃbhavet api
yatra dṛśyeta vaijātyam tathā tatra abhyupeyate
tāvatā nā eva sarvatra bhavet etasya kalpanam
kevala indriya jam ca api na kiñcid jñānam iṣyate
sahakāri viśeṣām hi vibhidyante pratīndriyam
atas saṃskāra saṃbhede pi a parokṣa tva yogataḥ
pratyakṣa tvam vikalpasya na kvacid vinivartate

original: “nirvikalpakamekajātīyeṣu dravyeṣu prathamapiṇḍagrahaṇam” ityādibhāṣyaṃ tu udāharaṇaparaṃ yojyam /
analyzed: nirvikalpakam eka jātīyeṣu dravyeṣu prathama piṇḍa grahaṇam ityādi bhāṣyam tu udāharaṇa param yojyam

original: ata eva hi śrīviṣṇucittairuktam--- “saṃskārodbodhasahakṛtendriyajanyaṃ jñānaṃ savikalpakam,
analyzed: atas eva hi śrī viṣṇucittaiḥ uktam saṃskāra udbodha sahakṛta indriya janyam jñānam savikalpakam

original: ekajātīyeṣu prathamapiṇḍagrahaṇam dvitīyādipiṇḍagrahaṇeṣu prathamākṣasaṃnipātajaṃ ca jñānaṃ nirvikalpakam” iti /
analyzed: eka jātīyeṣu prathama piṇḍa grahaṇam dvitīya ādi piṇḍa grahaṇeṣu prathama akṣa saṃnipāta jam ca jñānam nirvikalpakam iti
anyatra ca uktam kevala cakṣuḥ ādi indriya janyam nirvikalpakam ityādi
yat tu uktam tattvaratnākare viśeṣaṇānām sva ayoga vyāvṛttiḥ avikalpake
sa vikalpe ni ayogasya vyāvṛttiḥ saṃjñitā tathā
iti tatra api saṃskāra nirapekṣa tva sāpekṣa tvayoḥ pradarśana para tvam grāhyam

original: pratyakṣasya caivaṃ vibhāgo 'bhihitaḥ--- “dvividhaṃ caitat pratyakṣam--- arvācīnamanarvācīnaṃ ca /
analyzed: pratyakṣasya ca evam vibhāgaḥ bhihitaḥ dvividham ca etat pratyakṣam arvācīnam anarvācīnam ca
yugapad aśeṣa viṣaya sākṣātkāra kṣamam anarvācīnam
tat yogi mukteśvarāṇām prabhāva viśeṣa adhīnam upapādayiṣyate ityādi

original: ata eva kudṛṣṭīnāṃ sanmātragrāhi pratyakṣamityavilakṣajalpitaṃ nirastam /
analyzed: atas eva kudṛṣṭīnām sat mātra grāhi pratyakṣam iti avilakṣa jalpitam nirastam
krama yaugapadya ādi dūṣaṇam tu bhrānti vikalpe samānam

original: bhrāntirūpo 'pi hi vikalpaḥ kṣaṇikatvānna viramya vyāpartumalam /
analyzed: bhrānti rūpaḥ hi vikalpaḥ kṣaṇika tvāt na viramya vyāpartum alam
na ca pūrvajñāna vārtām jānāti

original: na ca svayaṃ dharmipratiyogigrahaṇābhāve bhedagrahaṇaṃ manyase /
analyzed: na ca svayam dharmi pratiyogi grahaṇa abhāve bheda grahaṇam manyase
tathā api yadi kalpanā bheda viśiṣṭam yugapad gṛhṇāti
kā pratyakṣe sarpa mṛtiḥ
atas dharmi vat yogya tvāt jāti ādi rūpa bhedaḥ pi yugapad grāhyeḥ

original: abheda iva bhedo 'pi svarūpataḥ pratītau na pratiyogisākāṅkṣaḥ;
analyzed: abhedaḥ iva svarūpataḥ pratītau na pratiyogi sākāṅkṣaḥ
bheda vyavahāraḥ tu abheda vyavahāra vat tad sākāṅkṣa
atas prathamam eva bheda dhīḥ yuktā

original: ata eva dharmadharmiṇordharmipratiyoginoranyeṣāṃ ca pratītāvanyonyāśrayo nirastaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva dharma dharmiṇoḥ dharmi pratiyoginoḥ anyeṣām ca pratītau anyonya āśrayaḥ nirastaḥ
tatas ca vyupatteḥ tad vyavahāre pi na tad prasaṅgaḥ

original: bhedaśabdena vyavahārasya tu pratisaṃbandhinirūpitākāre vyutpannatvāt tadapekṣā /
analyzed: bheda śabdena vyavahārasya tu pratisaṃbandhi nirūpita ākāre vyutpanna tvāt tad apekṣā

original: bhedatvaṃ hi bhedānāṃ pratiyoginā nirūpyam na tu jātyādilakṣaṇaṃ svarūpam;
analyzed: bheda tvam hi bhedānām pratiyoginā nirūpyam na tu jāti ādi lakṣaṇam svarūpam
yad grahaḥ yatra yad āropa virodhī
sa hi tasya tasmāt bhedaḥ

original: gotvādi ca gṛhyamāṇaṃ svasmin svāśraye cāśvatvādyāropaṃ nirūṇaddhīti svasya svāśrayasya ca svayameva tasmādbhedaḥ //
analyzed: go tva ādi ca gṛhyamāṇam svasmin sva āśraye ca aśva tva ādi āropam nirūṇaddhi iti svasya sva āśrayasya ca svayam eva tasmāt bhedaḥ
api ca pratiyogi sāpekṣa tva nirapekṣa tva lakṣaṇa viruddha dharma adhyāsena bhedāt svarūpa bheda grahaṇa aikyām

original: na saṃbhavatīti vadan bhedaduṣaṇārthameva bhedaṃ sādhayatīti svavacanavirodha iti //
analyzed: na saṃbhavati iti vadan bheda duṣaṇa artham eva bhedam sādhayati iti sva vacana virodhaḥ iti
nyā pa pra
śabda janyam api pratyakṣam asti iti te eva varṇayanti
tat api ayuktam vyāghātāt

original: na hi parokṣajananasvabhāvatayā siddhā sāmagrī viśeṣābhāve kvacit svabhāvamatipatet /
analyzed: na hi parokṣa janana svabhāva tayā siddhā sāmagrī viśeṣa abhāve kvacid svabhāvam atipatet

original: na caikajātīyasāmagrītaḥ prasūtaṃ kāryaṃ vicitraṃ syāt,
analyzed: na ca eka jātīya sāmagrītaḥ prasūtam kāryam vicitram syāt

original: ekayaivava sāmagryā sarvajātīyotpattiprasaṅgāt ekasya kāryasya viruddhajātiyogaprasaṅgācca /
analyzed: ekayā eva ava sāmagryā sarva jātīya utpatti prasaṅgāt ekasya kāryasya viruddha jāti yoga prasaṅgāt ca
daśamaḥ tvam asi ityādi dṛṣṭānte tvam artha mātram pratyakṣam
daśamaḥ ham iti pratyayaḥ hi na indriya svātantryeṇa udeti
kintu puruṣa vacana anurodhena
tad mūle ced pratyakṣa tā

original: evam 'dharmavāṃstvamasi' iti kārtāntikopadeśādau 'tādṛśo 'hamasmi' iti bodhe dharmāderapi pratyakṣatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: evam dharmavān tvam asi iti kārtāntika upadeśa ādau tādṛśaḥ ham asmi iti bodhe dharma ādeḥ api pratyakṣa tva prasaṅgaḥ
tatas ca apratyakṣam iti jagati kiñcid na syāt
pratyakṣa bhūtam yat kiñcid uddiśya viśeṣaṇa tayā eva sarvasya pratyakṣa tva upapatteḥ

original: pūrvāvagatadaśamabhāvaṃ tu puruṣaṃ pratyupadeśe bhāṣarāśipraviṣṭamaṣīnyāyena pūrvāparāparokṣaṇīnairantaryeṇa
analyzed: pūrva avagata daśama bhāvam tu puruṣam pratyupadeśe bhāṣa rāśi praviṣṭa maṣī nyāyena pūrva apara apara ukṣaṇī nairantaryeṇa
madhya varti śabda janya dhiyā parokṣa tva vyavahāraḥ kasyacid syāt vā na vā
atas eva tattvam asi ādi śabdaḥ sva viṣaya gocara pratyakṣa jñāna janakaḥ
parokṣa artha gocara tvāt daśamaḥ tvam asi saṃvid sva prakāśā ityādi vākya vat ityādi anumānāni nirastāni
daśama tva sva prakāśa tva ādi viśiṣṭa ākāreṇa dṛṣṭānteṣu aparokṣa jñāna janana asiddheḥ
tathā vigītaḥ śabdaḥ na sva vācya gocara pratyakṣa dhī janakaḥ
śabda tvāt
saṃpratipanna vat
ityādi api pratiprayoktavyam
upalambha virodha śābda pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa saṃkara ādi prasaṅgaḥ tra vipakṣe bādhakaḥ
na evam pūrvasya
śabda janya pratyakṣam antareṇa api yogaja adṛṣṭa janita sākṣātkārāt praṇidhāna viśeṣa prasādita paramātma saṃkalpāt vā niḥśreyasa siddheḥ iti

original: pratyakṣaṃ cidacinmayaṃ jagadidaṃ yasyetyanuśrūyate yaścānanyadhiyāmanantavibhavaḥ pratyakṣatāmaśnute /
analyzed: pratyakṣam cit acit mayam jagat idam yasya iti anuśrūyate yaḥ ca an anya dhiyām ananta vibhavaḥ pratyakṣa tām aśnute

original: yaścaiko yugapatsadā svata idaṃ viśvaṃ darīdṛśyate prājñaṃ taṃ pratipannamokṣaṇavidhādakṣaṃ didṛkṣemahi //
analyzed: yaḥ ca ekaḥ yugapad sadā svatas idam viśvam darīdṛśyate prājñam tam pratipanna mokṣaṇa vidhā dakṣam didṛkṣemahi

original: iti śrīkavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya vedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāyapariśuddhau pratyakṣādhyāye dvitīyamāhnikam
analyzed: iti śrī kavi tārkikasiṃhasya sarva tantra svatantrasya śrīmat veṅkaṭanāthasya vedānta ācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāya pariśuddhau pratyakṣa adhyāye dvitīyam āhnikam

śrīmate nigama anta mahā deśikāya namaḥ
